bugSigSimple 0.99.4

    • COVID-19 associated microbiome

    • The Endometriosis-associated Microbiome

    Delivery Mode and the Meconium Microbiome

    2/24/2022

    capstoneanalysis_shaimaa.Rmd

    Analysis objectives

    1. Import, recode, and subset data from bugsigdb.org
    2. Create a table of studies
    3. Calculate the frequency of appearance of each taxa in independent signatures and identify the most frequently reported taxa

    Making sure packages are installed 

    install.packages(c("devtools", "tidyverse", "kableExtra"))
devtools::install_github("waldronlab/bugSigSimple")
devtools::install_github("waldronlab/BugSigDBStats")
devtools::install_github("waldronlab/bugsigdbr")

    Load and subset data 

    library(bugSigSimple)
library(BugSigDBStats)
library(bugsigdbr)
library(tidyverse)
    ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ──

    # use version="devel" and cache = FALSE to take the latest version from bugsigdb.org
dat <- bugsigdbr::importBugSigDB(version = "devel", cache = TRUE)

    Subsetting

    Subsetting only studies done on humans - 6 of 17 studies were excluded because they were either done on mice or not statistically reliable (Cregger et. al)

    subset.dat <-
  dat[which(
    dat$PMID == "30778155" |
      dat$PMID == "32192080" |
      dat$PMID == "31087436" |
      dat$PMID == "26901400" |
      dat$PMID == "33839907" |
      dat$PMID == "32046455" |
      dat$PMID == "33925708" |
      dat$PMID == "32299442" |
      dat$PMID == "33313185" |
      dat$PMID == "34268384" |
      dat$PMID == "33660232"
  ),]

    All studies

    Summary of studies and most frequent taxa increased and decreased in endometriosis patients for all studies

    bugSigSimple::createStudyTable(subset.dat)
    Study Condition Cases Controls Study Design
    Akiyama 2019 Endometriosis 30 39 cross-sectional observational, not case-control
    Ata 2019 Endometriosis 14 14 prospective cohort
    Chao 2021 Endometriosis 37 66 case-control
    Chen 2020 Endometriosis 14 67 cross-sectional observational, not case-control
    Hernandes 2020 Endometriosis 10 11 case-control
    Khan 2016 Endometriosis 32 32 case-control
    Lee 2021 Endometriosis 45 45 case-control
    Perrotta 2020 Endometriosis 14 21 cross-sectional observational, not case-control
    Shan 2021 Endometriosis 12 12 case-control
    Svensson 2021 Endometriosis 66 198 case-control
    Wei 2020 Endometriosis 36 14 cross-sectional observational, not case-control 
    getMostFrequentTaxa(subset.dat,n=10)
